page.title: 17TRADING-BLEWBURY
page.content: THE PETROL STATION IS THE ONLY ONE IN THE VILLAGE OF BLEWBURY.IT IS CALLED THE BLEWBURY SERVICE STATION AND IS SITUATED ON THE READING TO WANTAGE ROAD AND PROVIDES PETROL AND SPECIALISES IN THE SALE OF CAR TRAILERS.IT IS ALSO A SHOP WHICH SELLS GROCERIES,NEWSPAPERS, CIGARETTES,SWEETS,FRUITS AND VEGETABLES IT DOES NOT,AT THE PRESENT PROVIDE ANY FORM OF CAR SERVISING. THE COAL MERCHANT,THE BUILDING IS ABOUT SIXTY YEARS OLD AN ALWAYS BEEN A COAL YARD.THE COAL IS DELIVERED BY LORRY TO CUSTOMERS IN AN AREA OF ABOUT FIFTEEN MILES RADIUS.THERE ARE TWO LORRIES USED FOR DELIVERIES AND THREE PEOPLE ARE EMPLOYED THERE. AN OLD BARN ON THE LONDON ROAD HAS BEEN CONVERTED INTO A WINE SHOP.IT IS CALLED "SEBASTOPOL BARN.NEWSPAPERS,KNITTING MATERIALS AND PATTERNS ARE SOLD BY THE OWNERS OF A BUNGALOW ON BESSELS WAY.
